def main():
    w = input()
    print(w + "s")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
# https://atcoder.jp/contests/abc135/tasks/abc135_c
# https://atcoder.jp/contests/abc135/submissions/13179465


n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

# a = [1, 2, 3]
# b = [2, 1, 3]

a.sort()
b.sort()

min_cost = float('inf')
for i in range(n):
    cost = 0
    for j in range(n):
        cost += abs(b[j] - a[i])
    min_cost = min(min_cost, cost)

print(min_cost)
n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

# x = [1, 2, 3]
# n = 3

x.sort()

min_cost = float('inf')
for i in range(n):
    cost = 0
    for j in range(n):
        cost += abs(x[j] - x[i])
    min_cost = min(min_cost, cost)

print(min_cost)


import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    arr.sort()
    if n % 2 == 0:
        print(arr[n//2] - arr[n//2 - 1] + 1)
    else:
        print(0)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x.sort()
    if n % 2 == 0:
        print(x[n//2] - x[n//2-1])
    else:
        print(0)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import sys

def main():
    a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
    print((a*b)//2)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
print('hello world')

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

min_cost = float('inf')
for i in range(n):
    cost = 0
    for j in range(n):
        cost += abs(x[j] - x[i])
    min_cost = min(min_cost, cost)

print(min_cost)

def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))[:n]
    x.sort()
    if n % 2 == 0:
        print(x[n//2] - x[n//2 - 1])
    else:
        print(0)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
# https://atcoder.jp/contests/abc136/tasks/abc136_b
# https://atcoder.jp/contests/abc136/submissions/13180851


n = input()

n = int(n)
count = 0
for i in range(1, n + 1):
    if len(str(i)) % 2 == 1:
        count += 1

print(count)


def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x.sort()
    if n % 2 == 0:
        print(x[n//2] - x[n//2 - 1] + 1)
    else:
        print(0)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
